111.content:
A barghest was feasting on the remains of a a freshly killed bear. As it teared of flesh a hunter was looking at him from above just peeking down at the feasting barghest eyes focused on it like a hawk on a sparrow. He had daggers at the ready. He jumped down onto the barghests back and the beast turned to look but had little time to react as its throat was slit by the hunter.

You were satatisfied with your kill. You gutted the barghest and began butchering it for meat using your daggers. The gut was also good for drying and using in armor. "Another satisfying kill you said as you loaded the meat into your back pack. You then put the gut into a seperate part of it. You then cut the head off the barghest to take it home as a trophy. With everything packed up you started walking back to Didenhill
111.title: The hunter and the Hunted

1112.content:
As you were walking back you felt like you were being followed. You then heard the twitching of some grass from the trail behind you. You then got your faeblades off your back ready to fight whatever was going to come. You then heard a bush rustle. You then turned to it and saw it was rustling a little. “Come out, I hear you…,” you said gripping your faeblades readily. You then saw a wolf head popup. He then stood up revealing him to be a lycan. “Werewolf!” you yelled as you got ready to fight. “Whoa whoa whoa easy easy easy,” he said quickly as he crouched down and brung his arms up, “I’m not hostile I swear” “I thought your kind were Murderers,” you asked still holding your weapons ready. “My kind are not the beasts from lore,” he said with a sigh. I should not be racist...., you thought. You then put your faeblades away. “Sorry,” you said as you turned around and started walking again.

“Ummmm E-excuse me,” you heard the lycan say behind you. You stopped and turned to him. No racism, you thought to yourself. “Yes?” you asked. “Ummmm I could smell that you had some fresh meat on you and…,” he said as he got to his knees and looked at you with wide pupiled eyes, “I was hoping that I could have some.” Woah what is this... am I thinking of giving him some of my kill, you thought with suprise. “That’s…. cute…..” you said trying to resist. You then took meat from your backpack as if it wasnt you taking it. You then looked at the meat and gave a reluctant sigh. “Fine don’t say I gave you nothing,” you said offering the meat to him. He then took the meat from you.. “Thank you,” he politely said before he ate the peice of meat. “Uhhhh yeah….,” you said as you went to walk away. Thats embarassing, you thought.

“Ummmm can I come with you?” the lycan asked you. .... Did he just ask something i thought i heard, you thought. “Why?” you asked as you turned to him slowly. “Well you just seem like a good person to stick around with,” he replied. “Ok…,” you said looking at him. You saw his sharp teeth. “Will you harm the villagers though?” you asked. “No sir,” he said as he shook his head, “My pack told me to never harm the innocent. I’m going to be a good wolf.” He then did a toothy smile. You saw a large peice of barghest meat caught in it. “Ummmm ok...,” you said looking at it, “You may want to get that piece of meat out of your teeth though.” “Oh thank you,” he said as he picked the piece out of his teeth. “Anyway we will sneak you into my house for now and tell them about you later...,” you said wondering about his skill “Are you any good at Stealth?” “Yeah I am,” he said with a nod, “I am a Disciple after all.” You then looked at him. Wait magic is uncommon in werewolves? you thought. ”Magical?” you asked. “Yep,” he said as he pulled out his Chakrams and held them up, “I specialize in Ice.” “Ah… Cool….” you said with alittle humor. “Haha Yeah,” he laughed at the remark as he put them away. “Anyway… Let’s go,” you said as you started walking. “Ok,” he replied following with his tail wagging.
1112.title: Lycans are.... Cute?

121.content: It is a peaceful day as you walk through the forest. You quietly roam trying to find something to occupy your time. “(Sigh) So boring today.” You mumble as you look at the sky “Not many monsters to slay or villages to help with.” Just as you say that you feel your stomach growl. “Oh I guess it is time for a bite to eat.” You say as you sit down under a tree. You look through your bag looking for something to satisfy your hunger however you frown when you notice that your bag is empty. “Oh man I forgot to pack some food.” You say as your stomach growls even louder “Man I am so hungry.” Just then the scent of fresh killed meat reaches your nose. “Mmmmmmm that smells good” You say as you get on all fours and start walking in the direction of the smell. You close your eyes as you appear to run on your Lycan instincts as you follow the smell of food. You soon seem to find the source of the sent and you stop. You open your eyes as you are greeted by…
121.title: Starting the tale of the Lycan

1211.content:
As you open your eyes you notice that you have found a freshly killed Barghest however most of the meat had been removed from it. “Awwwwwwww” You say as you sniff the air. You find the sent and you look to see a man walking away with a back pack. “The meat must be in his backpack” You think as you watch him take his Faeblades off of his back “I better be careful on approach” You slowly begin to tail him as you slowly crawl into a bush. The man then turns to the bush and you stay motionless. “Come out, I hear you…” The man says to you gripping his blades tight. Knowing that you were caught you stand up from the bush and look at him. “Werewolf!” The man says as he grips his Faeblades. “Whoa whoa whoa easy easy easy.” You say quickly as you crouch down and bring your arms up “I’m not hostile I swear” “I thought your kind were Murderers” He asks still holding his weapons ready. “*Sigh* My kind are not the beasts from lore.” You say with a sigh. The man then put’s his Faeblade’s away. “Sorry” The man says as he turns around and starts walking again.
“Man I need some of that meat.” You think to yourself as you step out of the bush “I have no choice but to use my secret weapon.” “Ummmm E-excuse me” You say as you look to him. The man stops and turns to you “Yes?” “Ummmm I could smell that you had some fresh meat on you and…” You say as you then get on your knees and look up at him with big puppy eyes “I was hoping that I could have some.” The man then looks at you with a very surprised look on his face. “That’s…. cute…..” He says as he pulls some Barghest meat from his backpack. “It’s working” You think as your tail starts wagging still keeping your puppy eyes. He then gives the meat to you and says “Fine don’t say I gave you nothing.” You then take the meat from him. “Thank you.” You politely say before you quickly eat your meat. “Uhhhh yeah….” He replies to you as he turns to walk.
You then stand up and ask “Ummmm can I come with you?” “Why?” He says as he turns to you. “Well you just seem like a good person to stick around with.” You reply simply. “Ok…” He says looking at you “Will you harm the villagers though?” “No sir.” You say as you shake your head “My pack told me to never harm the innocent. I’m going to be a good wolf.” You finish with a toothy smile. “Ummmm ok...” He says looking at your sharp fangs “You may want to get that piece of meat out of your teeth though.” “Oh thank you.” You say as you pick the piece out of your teeth. “Anyway we will sneak you into my house for now and tell them about you later...” He informs you “Are you any good at Stealth?” “Yeah I am.” You say with a nod “I am a Disciple after all.” The man then looks at you confused by that statement. ”Magical?” He asks. “Yep” You say as you pull out your two Chakrams up “I specialize in Ice.” “Ah… Cool….” He replies. “Haha Yeah” You laugh at the remark as you put them away. “Anyway… Let’s go.” He says as he starts walking. “Ok” You reply as you follow him with your tail wagging.

Race History: The Draconian race became unwelcome on dry land due to their untrustworthieness, they eventually became a nomadic race, and live on boats that sail the sea, due to their life on the sea they have chosen Njordir as their patron God. When a Draconian comes of age he/she must for the first time in their life set foot on dry land, when their journey is complete they have the choice to remain on land or return to the fleet. Their bodies have adopted a few aquatic features from their life on the seas and their accustomed diet of fish. A young Draconian is unaware of the appearance of the races that dwell on land.

info.brief_description: Become a Rogue, Soldier or a Mage in this RPG inspired story
info.description:
This story takes place several months before the fateless one is created. You can choose to be anything, anywhere, in Amalur. I will try to provide help with it as much as possible. Email me if you have questions. I know alot about this game so dont hesitate to ask. I will just provide basics here:

- Amalur: http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-N9zrKXDqPOE/TveoB69aJAI/AAAAAAAACUk/ei7MDoacavY/s1600/...
- Dalentarth: Forest, home to city of Ysa of the Summer Fae. Home to Fomoros Hughes Allestar tower.
- Plains of Erathell. Nearly no trees. Mostly home to the Warsworn. Rathir, home to the Scholia Arcana magic school
- Detyre: Home to Motus mining (Gnomes). Adessa, Gnome city and home to Praetorians.

Thats as far as I have gooten through the locations. The rest you may have to do digging in Amalur Wiki.

There are 9 Basic Weapons and they are as Follows (Categorically)
Might
Longsword
Hammer
Greatsword

Finesse
Daggers
Longbow
Faeblades

Sorcerry
Staff
Sceptres
Chakrams

Each one of these weapons are unique in their own way. I will allow Custom Weapons.

I think I might throw in a few pictures of the Power trees:
Finesse: http://amalurfoundry.com/guides/reckoning-guides/reckoning-finesse/
Might: http://amalurfoundry.com/guides/reckoning-guides/reckoning-might/
Sorcery: http://amalurfoundry.com/guides/reckoning-guides/reckoning-sorcery/

I will only allow custom powers but a maximum of 4 powers per character
I do not want Sally sues in this. You give a name to your characters destiny, just don make it outlandish and Keep it true to true KoA

Destinies: http://www.ea.com/au/reckoning/1/destinies

Skills are fairly Basic and there are 9 types to choose
Alchemy
Blacksmith
Detect Hidden [Sensory]
Dispelling [Removing wards]
Mercantile [Skill in Bartering]
Lockpicking
Persuasion
Sagecraft [Gem creating/Weapon enhancing]
Stealth

Only 3 from thiis I would reccomend. All the things you dont pick should be what your character is okay at but not nessecarily exceptional.

Anyway custom races are allowed here but I will still remind of the basics
Almain (Human)
Varani (Human)
Ljosalfar (Light Elves)
Dokkalfar (Dark elves)
Gnome
Summer Fae
Winter Fae
Tuatha-Doehn

http://amalur.wikia.com/wiki/Races
Feel free to create your own, you dont have to stick to the racial bonuses as you pick your own.

They are as capible of just about any other races when it comes to skills they can learn. Their instices make them exilent hunters and trackers.
